name: Chakravyuh The Game
description:
Chakravyuh is an action adventure game with a heavy focus on Boss Fights and Story.

Although this playtest version contains neither, this version is meant for playtesting of traversal, exploration and basic Combat mechanics only.

The Upcoming demo will contain bits of story and a full fledged Boss fight.

To keep up with all the updates and development of this game, subscribe to my youtube Channel : (46) Sourish Basu - YouTube

This version does not represent the actual game i.e. this is not a demo, this is only meant for playtesting
